channel.title: 🏢 Toyota Research Institute on NeurIPS 2024
channel.description: Recent content in 🏢 Toyota Research Institute on NeurIPS 2024

item.title: $SE(3)$ Equivariant Ray Embeddings for Implicit Multi-View Depth Estimation
item.description: SE(3)-equivariant ray embeddings in Perceiver IO achieve state-of-the-art implicit multi-view depth estimation, surpassing methods that rely on data augmentation for approximate equivariance.
